headline: Exxon and 9 More Dividend Stocks to Buy for a Rocky Market

headline: Is Invesco’s 34.6% Share Price Surge in 2024 Justified?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Invesco stock? You are not alone. With the share price closing at $23.00 and returns of 34.6% over the past year, it has caught the attention of investors looking for growth opportunities that are not flying completely under the radar. The jump is not just a short-term fluke either. Over the last five years, Invesco has notched a staggering 110.5% return. Even looking at the more recent numbers, you will see a year-to-date rise of 30.3%, further bolstered by...
